traits.title: Analytical
traits.description: It comes easy for me to see connections and I find it easy to stay calm in fast-moving, stressful environments.

traits.title: Driven
traits.description: I find motivation in exceeding the expectations others have on me and I constantly search for methods and habits that improve my professional and interpersonal skills.

traits.title: Collaborative
traits.description: I consider myself to be good at considering the opinion of others before making decision and I strongly believe in the advantages of teamwork.

traits.title: Accuracy
traits.description: It is important to me that my work is at its highest level.

traits.title: Organised
traits.description: Good at planning and structure, handling different tasks of different aspects in stressful environments.

traits.title: Educational
traits.description: Easy going in many areas and I do see the importance of clearness and can easily adapt my way of working style.
